#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
void asc(int a[], int t)
{
	int temp;
	for(int i=0; i<=t; ++i)
	{
		for(int j=0; j<i; ++j)
		{
			if( a[j]>a[i] )
			{
				temp=a[i];
				a[i]=a[j];
				a[j]=temp;
			}
		}
	}
}

int ex_range=-1,ex_d,ex_total,ex_n;

void fun(int arr[], int & i)
{
	if( arr[i] > ex_range )
	{
		if( i != (ex_n-1) )
		{
			int allowed=arr[i]+ex_d;
		
			while( arr[i] <= allowed )
			{
				++i;
			}
			--i;
			ex_range=arr[i]+ex_d;
			++ex_total;
		}
		else
		{
			++ex_total;
		}
	}
}


int main()
{
	int arr[200],t;
	char ch[100];
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>ex_d>>ex_n;
		if( (ex_d==-1) && (ex_n==-1) )
		{
			break;
		}

		ex_total=0;
		ex_range=-1;
		t=-1;

		for(int i=0; i<ex_n; ++i)
		{
				
			cin>>ch;

			arr[ ++t ]=atoi(ch);
			
				
		}
		
			asc(arr, t);


			int z=0;
			while( z<=t )
			{

				fun( arr, z );

				++z;

			}

			cout<<ex_total<<endl;
		
	}

	return 0;
}
